amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part A of House Report 118-685 to specify that the prohibition on discrimination by public universities against religious student organizations based on their leadership standards includes leadership standards regarding religious identity, belief, or practice.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
